transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Afnan ji?
Customer: Haan ji bhaiya kya haal hai?
Executive: Badhiya badhiya sir, aap kaise hain Afnan ji? Ranjit bol raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji Ranjit bhai.
Executive: Sir aapne abhi customer care mein call kiya tha?
Customer: Haan, jaa sakta hu kya problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Main aapke paas, aapke paas kar raha tha toh woh waha pe lag gaya customer care ke paas.
Executive: Achha achha toh bataiye sir kya kuch issue aa raha hai ya kuch problem?
Customer: Na na issue koi nahi aa raha. Mere dost ne number liya aapka, usko number diya maine aapko.
Executive: Mere ko kya WhatsApp kiya hai kya number aapne?
Customer: Nahi, maine aapka number diya apne dost ko. Woh kuch aapke uske baare mein IndiaMART ke baare mein kuch pata karega ya kuch naya account wagera khulwayega toh uske baare mein bata dena.
Executive: Achha main bata dunga sir. Wohi main dekha ki aapne customer care mein call kiya hai toh main socha ki kuch problem aa raha hai kya aapka.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh lag gayi, call lag gayi.
Executive: Mera number aapke paas hai nahi kya ab tak?
Customer: Haan woh main aapko call kar raha tha lekin woh customer care pe call lag gayi.
Executive: Achha achha chaliye theek hai sir, no problem. Aur sir main jaan sakta hu service mein toh koi dikkat issue nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi koi issue nahi, sahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Okay and Afnan ji, main thoda sa aap se yeh puchna chah raha tha ki aap buyer se kyun nahi apne rating and review ko lete ho sir? Thoda sa rating and review lo thoda sa achha lagega ki koi saamne se aapka catalog dekhega toh unko bhi lagega ki haan yaar itna achha rating inko mila hua hai. Toh thoda sa buyer se rating and review maangiye na.
Customer: Bas mujhe thoda sa lagiv lagta hai rating maangna.
Executive: Nahi sir dekho, aapka nature jis tarah main ek saal se aap se baat kar raha hu, theek hai chaliye deal hua nahi hua koi baat nahi. Lekin aap se kuch achhe log bhi jude honge jo do mahine, teen mahine ke baad bole honge chalo main dekhta hu lekin aapke vyavhar se aapke baat karne se bhi woh log rating de sakte hain sir. Toh ek baar unse try toh karo ki haan yaar aap mere catalog ko rating dijiye hamare baat karne ke upar ya jaise bhi karke aap koshish karo ki aap apne rating ko badhao sir. Yeh cheez thoda sa saharan matlab ki bada market hai. Toh log yeh bhi dekhte hain ki kiska rating jyada mila hua hai sir. Isliye aapko bol raha hu.
Customer: Haan toh mere hai chaar paanch customer hai jinka mera kaam chal raha hai aur laga hua hai pehle bhi chala gaya unke paas mein toh unko bol dunga woh kar denge rating ko.
Executive: Haan unse rating lo aap proper tarike se catalog mein apne rating ko badhane mein focus karo sir. And thoda sa aapne IndiaMART ka jo application hai uska use toh aap reply toh karte ho lekin application se call kyun nahi kar rahe ho? Thoda sa application LMS se call bhi karo sir.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Hmm, jaise ki aap reply turant karte ho jaise ki ek mahine mein 274 inquiry aayi thi aapne 292 reply kiya hai. Theek hai ek mahine mein lekin agar callback ki baat karu toh teen hi call kiya hai system se.
Customer: Call kam karta hu thoda WhatsApp se catalog bhejta hu WhatsApp se baat kar leta hu.
Executive: Hmm, wohi cheez mujhe bhi dikh raha hai. Wohi cheez maine bola na ki aapne reply toh jyada hi kiya hai lekin call sirf teen hi call kiya hai sir.
Customer: Nahi main call nahi karta. Main directly message karke usse baat kar leta hu WhatsApp par hota hai uska mood lene ka toh theek hai nahi toh mana kar deta hai.
Executive: Achha. Nahi sir thoda sa iska aap dekho agar call mein agar aap baat kar sakte ho thoda sa call mein focus kijiye. Main aapke bhalai ke liye bol raha hu aapke liye hi sahi bol raha hu sir.
Customer: Chaliye ab call kar liya karenge.
Executive: Aur sir ji wooden single bed mein deal karte hain kya sir? Wooden single bed matlab ki har ek type ke bed mein deal karte hain kya wooden single bed ke type mein?
Customer: Haan bahaal wood ka hai toh sab kuch hi deal karte hain jo milta hai.
Executive: Matlab ki aisa toh nahi hai teak wood particular ya sagwan ka?
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Yeh category add kar du category add nahi kar paunga.
Customer: Haan woh bhi add kar denge kar do aap.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir main isko add kar deta hu aur Afnan ji ek request hai aapne customer care mein call kiya tha toh ek ticket hamara open ho jata hai. Us ticket ko main close kar du?
Customer: Haan close kar do woh lag gaya tha mere se call.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai no issue and aapke paas email mein sir ek feedback aayega do minute ka time nikal ke usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega aur jo bhi mere liye feedback hai mere liye ek feedback dal dijiyega sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Aapke mail ID mein aayega jo aapka mail ID hai toh Afnan Malik 57@gmail.com.
Customer: Haan abhi do minute mein aapke paas aa jayega toh feedback jarur de dijiyega sir.
Customer: Yeh kuch wagera ka kya option aaya isme?
Executive: Haan jo aapka mail ID hai na sir usi mein aayega.
Customer: Kya karna hai isme?
Executive: Main bol raha hu sir ki aapke paas ek feedback mail aayega na IndiaMART ke side se us feedback mein na sir satisfied mark kar dijiyega aur mere liye servicing se related agar aap mere servicing se jaisa bhi aapko lagta hai woh feedback aap waha pe likh ke submit kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Yeh kaha pe hoga?
Customer: Sir main abhi email khola hai apna toh email mera
Executive: Your ticket
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi nahi aayega sir abhi matlab ki do minute wait kar lo paanch minute aapke paas aa jayega sir. Theek hai theek hai aap usme mere friend se baat kar lijiye na woh call aayegi.
Executive: Theek hai haan unka call aayega toh main turant utha ke baat kar lunga aur aapko main bata bhi dunga ki haan sir aapke client se baat ho gayi hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called to inquire about an issue.

- Customer wants to know about rating and reviews.

- Customer wants to add a category.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of ratings/reviews.

- Executive agreed to add the requested category.

- Executive requested feedback on the call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- rating, reviews, catalog, feedback, category
